explanation: [0-0] In a vibrant and colorful room, a young girl dressed as Pikachu sits bored on a sofa, holding a bowl of colorful candies. Some blue and pink decorations can be seen in the background, and the walls are painted with white and green stripes.

[0-5] Suddenly, the camera zooms out, showing the girl still sitting on the sofa as a woman dressed as Jigglypuff appears beside her. The woman holds a toy microphone. The image freezes with colorful special effects filling the screen. An animated Jigglypuff and the pink words "JIGG" and "LYPUFF" appear consecutively. Throughout this, the girl in the background remains expressionless, staring straight ahead.
